title: Classic mincemeat
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) green apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '225g (8 oz) sultanas', '225g (8 oz) dried currants', '225g (8 oz) raisins', '225g (8 oz) shredded beef suet', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '225g (8 oz) soft brown sugar', '110g (4 oz) mixed peel', '50g (2 oz) sliced almonds', '2 lemons, juiced and zested', '4 tablespoons brandy', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
